critique: This document establishes a framework for collecting recreation user fees at federal recreation areas. It aims to ensure adequate outdoor recreation resources for Americans by coordinating efforts between various government levels and private interests. The order designates areas where fees will be charged, sets criteria for designation, and establishes a process for setting and coordinating fees. It also addresses the posting of designated areas and the review of existing contracts related to non-Federal management of Federally-owned outdoor recreation areas.
